Comment: I decided on this on the principle of why not, nothing else has worked against her.
I knew that the opening called Caro-Kann was OK for Black, and this is just a mirror reflection, so I should be fine, right?
4...P-N3 costs me a Rook after 5 QxKP ch, so that's out...
She plays QxKP ch anyway... at least I'm only out a Pawn...
H'mmm... I doubt my King will survive.
She does it again. I smile wanly and shake my head.
